entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
